LanguageData.AS_WHE_MidBulletResearch.label: Ancient Technology Special Ammo Research
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MidBulletResearch.description: Research on technology used by certain ancient races to find more powerful ammunition available for firearms.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ATWeaponCustomizationResearch.des: Technology research to modify and further enhance ancient technology.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Basic.label: Half Elf Simple Apparel
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Basic.description: Technology for creating simple apparel for half-elves.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Elementary.label: Half-Elven Elementary Apparel
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Elementary.description: Technology for creating rudimentary apparel for half-elves.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Intermediate.label: Half Elven Complex Apparel
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Intermediate.description: Technology for creating intricate apparel for half-elves.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Spacer.label: Half Elven Advanced Apparel
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Apparel_Spacer.description: Technology for creating advanced clothing, adapted from half-elf technology.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_HyperShieldScarfResearch.label: HyperShieldScarfResearch
LanguageData.AS_WHE_HyperShieldScarfResearch.descript: Researching techniques for modifying shield scarves using ancient techniques.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_NanoSuitsResearch.label: Nanosuit Research
LanguageData.AS_WHE_NanoSuitsResearch.description: Research and development of full-body nanosuits using ancient technology.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Weapons.label: Half Elf Weapon Tech
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Weapons.description: Allows crafting weapons with half-elf knowledge and skills.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_RelicKnightsSwordReWeaponResearch: Research on knight swords used by ancient elves. Once completed, you will be able to create a replica version.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_HalfElvenBowResearch.label: Elvish Bow Analysis
LanguageData.AS_WHE_HalfElvenBowResearch.description: Research an ancient Elven bow. Once completed, you will be able to create a replica version.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_CompoundBowResearch.label: Half Elven Compound Bow Research
LanguageData.AS_WHE_CompoundBowResearch.description: Use your knowledge of ancient technology to research new mechanical bows.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenCompoundBowResearch.label: ElvenCompoundBow Research
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenCompoundBowResearch.descript: In addition to half-elf knowledge and knowledge of ancient technology, research a new mechanical bow that combines ancient elven technology.
